Tragedy can strike if they don’t.
跨性别青年的家庭不再将科罗拉多州视为性别肯定护理的避风港放学后的一个星期五，现年6岁的Esa Rodrigues揭开了一块纱球，吓到了宠物猫，对家庭成员进行了对他们最喜欢的颜色的调查，并在兄弟姐妹身上叮叮当当地称她为“屁股摩尔老鼠”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/families-of--transgender-youth-no-no-no-no-longer-view-colorado-as-as-a-a-a-a-a-a-a-a haven-for-gender-gender-gender-gender-for-for-for-for-for-for-forfirming-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/families-of--transgender-youth-no-no-no-no-longer-view-colorado-as-as-a-a-a-a-haven-for-gender-gender-vorn-gender-vorrming-formerming-care-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c9b26d3-4d1B-4CAC-897C-03081D5DDDDDD4E Mon, 14 Apr 2025 05:52:13 -0400 Families of transgender youth no longer view Colorado as a haven for gender-affirming care
灾难中的医疗保健机会有限可能会阻碍及时的结直肠癌诊断根据最近的一项分析，结直肠癌（CRC）的诊断发生率在飓风Irma和Maria和Puerto Rico的Covid-19大流行后不久下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/limited-health-care-care-access-disasters-disasters-may-hinder-hinder-timely-colorororecolorecoloreclorecancercancer-diarose.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/limited-health-care-care-access-disasters-may-hinder-hinder-timely-colorororerororerorerororeclororeclororeclorecloreclorecloreclorcancer-diarose.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01077b22-c9f3-4279-b565-f1347f1347f9f9f9faf52 Mon, 14 Apr 2025 05:39:01 -0400 Limited health care access during disasters may hinder timely colorectal cancer diagnoses

新指南采用以患者为中心的方法来管理儿童的肥胖症一项新的指南，以帮助医疗保健提供者管理儿童和青少年的肥胖症采用以患者为中心的方法，强调行为和心理支持，重点是患者及其家人珍视的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/new-guideline-takes-akes-a-patient-centered-centered-centerc--parcreact-to-managing-managing-managing-managing-mobesity-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/new-guideline-takes-ake-a-patient-centered-centered-centerce-to-managing-managing-managing-managing-mbesity-mobesity-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6db1f286-600D-4F03-4F03-8B87-10569B94F439 Mon, 14 Apr 2025 04:49:06 -0400 New guideline takes a patient-centered approach to managing obesity in children
